# HMError.Code.operationCancelled

**Case**

An error indicating the user canceled the operation.

## Declaration

```swift
case operationCancelled
```

## Operation errors

- **HMError.Code.operationInProgress**: An error indicating the operation is already in progress.
- **HMError.Code.operationTimedOut**: An error indicating the operation timed out.

items.description: An error indicating the operation is already in progress.
